# Introduction and Overview

`mlr3` by Example


::: {.cell layout-align="center" hash='index_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_2e1d035ee01721a5dc6a30f0846afa50'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(mlr3verse)
library(mlr3pipelines)
library(mlr3benchmark)
```
:::

::: {.cell layout-align="center" hash='index_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_4af1e2d27439b1850f49c62e29d770a3'}

```{.r .cell-code}
set.seed(123)

library(mlr3)
task = tsk("penguins")
split = partition(task)
learner = lrn("classif.rpart")

learner$train(task, row_ids = split$train)
learner$model

prediction = learner$predict(task, row_ids = split$test)
prediction

prediction$score(msr("classif.acc"))
```
:::






::: {.callout-tip title="To be continued"}
